purpleculture_pinyin:
yú
excellence; luster of gems
совершенство; блеск драгоценных камней
purpleculture_info:
Antonyms: 瑕
Pictophonetic: 俞 indicates the sound; 王 (jade) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
瑜伽 [ yú jiā ]: yoga (loanword)
瑜珈 [ yú jiā ]: variant of 瑜伽 ; yoga
瑕不掩瑜 [ xiá bù yǎn yú ]: lit. a blemish does not obscure jade's luster; the pros outweigh the cons (idiom)
瑕瑜互见 [ xiá yú hù jiàn ]: to have both defects and merits (idiom)
周瑜 [ zhōu yú ]: Zhou Yu or Chou Yü (175-210), famous general of the southern Wu kingdom and victor of the battle of Redcliff; in Romance of the Three Kingdoms, absolutely no match for Zhuge Liang

    • 王 [ wáng ] king, ruler; royal; surname
    • 俞 [ yú ] to consent, to approve; surname
Ru_trainchinese: yú: (графема) лучший нефрит, прекрасный самоцвет; блеск прекрасного нефрита, (обр.) добродетели
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " Jade " and " Yu ", the original meaning is beautiful jade. "Shuowen": "Jinyu, beautiful jade. Congyu, Yu Sheng." Pre-Qin documents use its original meaning, such as "Zuo Zhuan·Xuangong Fifteen Years": "Mountain Serb hides disease, Jinyu hides flaws." For example, "Huainanzi · Misclaim": "It's useless, Biyu dung." The original meaning of this is also seen in Tang Dynasty documents, such as Han Yu's Epitaph of Ma Jun, Young Supervisor in the Palace: "Juan Hao Jingxiu, Yaohuan Yuer ".

" Yu " can be extended to the brilliance of jade. "Shuowenxi Zhuan·Jade Department": "Yu, the brilliance of jade." This meaning is also used in the pre-Qin literature, such as "Book of Rites·Primary Righteousness": "Flaws do not cover up Yu, Yu does not cover up flaws.

" Yu " can also be extended to be beautiful, beautiful. For example, "Han Shu·Li Yue Zhi": "Xiang Zaiyu, Bai Jixi", Yan Shi Gu's note: "Yu, beautiful appearance." This meaning is also used in Southern Dynasty poems, such as Bao Zhao's "Fu Rong Fu": "Pumping Guilan from my guil, point to kiss the Yuci", "Yuci" refers to beautiful words.
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " Jade " and " Yu ", the original meaning is beautiful jade.
humanum_full_description:
從「玉」，「俞」聲，本義為美玉。《說文》：「瑾瑜，美玉也。从玉，俞聲。」先秦文獻用其本義，如《左傳·宣公十五年》：「山薮藏疾，瑾瑜匿瑕。」又如《淮南子·謬稱》：「無所用之，碧瑜糞土也。」唐代文獻也見此本義，如韓愈〈殿中少監馬君墓誌銘〉：「娟好靜秀，瑤環瑜珥」。

　　「瑜」可引申為玉的光彩。《說文繫傳·玉部》：「瑜，玉之光采也。」先秦文獻也用此義，如《禮記·聘義》：「瑕不揜瑜，瑜不揜瑕」。

　　「瑜」亦可引申為美貌，美好。如《漢書·禮樂志》：「象載瑜，白集西」，顏師古注：「瑜，美貌也」。南朝詩賦也用此義，如鮑照〈芙蓉賦〉：「抽我衿之桂蘭，點子吻之瑜辭」，「瑜辭」即指美好的言辭。

從「 玉 」，「 俞 」聲，本義為美玉。《說文》：「瑾瑜，美玉也。从玉，俞聲。」先秦文獻用其本義，如《左傳·宣公十五年》：「山薮藏疾，瑾瑜匿瑕。」又如《淮南子·謬稱》：「無所用之，碧瑜糞土也。」唐代文獻也見此本義，如韓愈〈殿中少監馬君墓誌銘〉：「娟好靜秀，瑤環瑜珥」。 「 瑜 」可引申為玉的光彩。《說文繫傳·玉部》：「瑜，玉之光采也。」先秦文獻也用此義，如《禮記·聘義》：「瑕不揜瑜，瑜不揜瑕」。 「 瑜 」亦可引申為美貌，美好。如《漢書·禮樂志》：「象載瑜，白集西」，顏師古注：「瑜，美貌也」。南朝詩賦也用此義，如鮑照〈芙蓉賦〉：「抽我衿之桂蘭，點子吻之瑜辭」，「瑜辭」即指美好的言辭。
From the sound of " Jade" and " Yu", the original meaning is beautiful jade. "Shuowen": "Jinyu, beautiful jade. Congyu, Yu Sheng." Pre-Qin documents use its original meaning, such as "Zuo Zhuan·Xuangong Fifteen Years": "Mountain Serb hides disease, Jinyu hides flaws." For example, "Huainanzi · Misclaim": "It's useless, Biyu dung." The original meaning of this is also seen in Tang Dynasty documents, such as Han Yu's Epitaph of Ma Jun, Young Supervisor in the Palace: "Juan Hao Jingxiu, Yaohuan Yuer ". " Yu" can be extended to the brilliance of jade. "Shuowenxi Zhuan·Jade Department": "Yu, the brilliance of jade." This meaning is also used in the pre-Qin literature, such as "Book of Rites·Primary Righteousness": "Flaws do not cover up Yu, Yu does not cover up flaws. " Yu" can also be extended to be beautiful, beautiful. For example, "Han Shu·Li Yue Zhi": "Xiang Zaiyu, Bai Jixi", Yan Shi Gu's note: "Yu, beautiful appearance." This meaning is also used in Southern Dynasty poems, such as Bao Zhao's "Fu Rong Fu": "Pumping Guilan from my guil, point to kiss the Yuci", "Yuci" refers to beautiful words.

瑜字的基本解释

瑜
yú
美玉。
〔瑜伽〕a.大乘佛教的派别之一，称“瑜伽宗”；b.印度哲学的一派，此派注重调息、静坐等修行方法。
玉的光泽，喻优点：瑕瑜互见。瑕不掩瑜。
fine jadevirtues瑕

瑜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yú］
［《廣韻》羊朱切，平虞，以。］
(1)美玉。
(2)玉的光彩。比喻优点。
(3)形容美好。
(4)见“瑜伽”。

瑜字的英文翻译

◎ 瑜
fine jade, virtues

瑜字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　瑜； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页738第07
【唐韻】羊朱切【韻會】容朱切【正韻】雲俱切，?音兪。【說文】瑾瑜，美玉也。【徐曰】瑜亦玉之光采也。【左傳·宣十五年】瑾瑜匿瑕。【禮·玉藻】世子佩瑜玉而綦組綬。又【聘義】瑕不掩瑜。【註】瑜，其中閒美者。　又【前漢·禮樂志】象載瑜白集西。【師古註】象載，象輿也。山出象輿，瑞應車也。瑜，美貌，言此瑞車瑜然色白而出西方也。　又人名。【曹植·靈芝篇】伯瑜年七十，綵衣以娛親。

瑜字的源字形

瑜字的起名意思

：指美玉或玉的光泽。

[Yoga] a. One of the schools of Mahayana Buddhism, called "Yoga"; b. A school of Indian philosophy, this school focuses on practice methods such as pranayama and meditation.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　yu; Kangxi strokes: 14; page number: page 738 to 07
[Tang Yun] Sheep Zhuqie [Rhyme Meeting] Rong Zhuqie [Zheng Yun] Clouds are all cut,? Yin Yu. [Said Wen] Jinyu, Meiyu is also. [Xu Yue] Yu is also the glory of jade. [Zuo Zhuan·Xuan Fifteen Years] Jin Yu hides flaws. 【Rite·Yuzao】The elder son wears Yu and Qi group cogs. Also [employment] flaws do not conceal goodness. [Note] Yu, among them is the leisurely beauty.　[Previous Han·Liyue Zhi] Xiang Zaiyu Bai Jixi. [Shigu Note] Xiang Zai, Xiang Yu also. Xiangyu comes out of the mountain, and Ruiying is also a car. Yu, beautiful, said that Rui Che Yu has gone out of the West in vain.　Another name. 【Cao Zhi·Ganoderma lucidum】Bo Yu is in his seventieth year, with colorful clothes for entertaining relatives.

是优质的玉。本义是美玉。

Пиктофонетические символы.
Yu (wang) выражает смысл, его изображение похоже на нитку нефрита, что означает нефрит; Yu (yd) выражает звук, Yu - лодка, сделанная из древних выдолбленных деревьев, а ее древесина превосходна и непроницаема, что указывает на то, что Ю - высококачественный нефрит.
Первоначальное значение - красивый нефрит.
① Мэйю: Джин ~.
2 Сияние нефрита - метафора его достоинств: недостатки ~ видят друг друга | недостатки не скрывают ~.
уй
